items.sentence: Tom claimed he had been captured by the enemy.
Tom closed his eyes and listened to the music.
Tom is one of the richest guys I\'ve ever met.
Tom is one of the smartest men I\'ve ever met.
Tom is one of the tallest guys I\'ve ever met.
I was drunk and didn\'t know what I was doing.
Tom fell in love with the captain\'s daughter.
Tom should definitely ask for Mary\'s opinion.
Tom didn\'t go to the same school as Mary did.
Tom didn\'t want to become a lawyer or doctor.
Tom doesn\'t have to listen to what Mary says.
Tom should\'ve bought Mary a birthday present.
Tom still doesn\'t know what needs to be done.
I have a few questions about Tom\'s operation.
I have a pretty good idea why Tom isn\'t here.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what you told him to do.
I hope Tom didn\'t notice what you were doing.
Tom never told Mary where he hid the diamonds.
Tom never told me that he was going to resign.
Tom never warned Mary about what might happen.
